entry.title: FOG ADVISORY ENDED, Lytton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 02:54 AM PST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, 5.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lytton 02:28 AM PST Wednesday 28 December 2022
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: 5.1°C
Pressure: 99.4 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 82 %
Dewpoint: 2.3°C
Wind: S 30 km/h gust 54 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few showers. Low plus 1.

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High plus 5. POP 60%
